title: Edit a budget type record
content:
You can edit multiple records simultaneously by selecting them in the grid and updating them in the Preview pane on the right. For more information, see Mass update.

  1. From the main menu, select Run > Financials > Budget Types. The Budget Types page is displayed.

  2. Click the record identifier in the ID column to display the selected record.

  3. Click the tab you want to view or edit. The General tab is displayed by default.

    Tab Description
    General Displays details of the selected record. For more information, see the General tab section.
    Workflow Displays the workflow for the selected record. To change the status to inactive, you must have the appropriate rights. For more information about the workflow, see Budget type workflow.
    Cost Types

    Displays any cost types related to the selected record. These cost types are used to determine which expense lines should be tracked against a budget, so that the Budget analysis view can display a chart comparing the planned budget with the actual expenditure.

    To relate a cost type to this budget type record, click the Add icon . This displays a context-based list of suggested cost types. Suggestions are based on keywords in the cost type and budget type titles. For example, if the title of the budget type is "Laptop", cost types with titles such as "Laptop expenses" will be suggested. Alternatively, you can use the search option to search for a cost type. It may take up to five minutes for a newly added cost type to appear in the search results.

    Note that both the list of suggestions and the search results display only cost types that aren't already related to a budget type and are currently active. If all cost types are either inactive or related to a budget type, both the list of suggestions and the search results will appear empty.

    For more information about cost types, see Cost Types.
    Discussions Displays any relevant conversations about the selected record. For more information about discussions, see Discussions.
    History Displays changes to the selected record. For more information about history, see History.

  4. Save your changes.

General tab

This tab includes the following sections:

Details

Field Description
Title External (common) name of the budget type.
Code Internal code for the budget type.
Description Description that captures the details of the budget type.

Attachments

Click Add attachment if you want to attach a file to the record.

Notes:

  • The supported attachment file formats and the maximum file size of an attachment are defined in the tenant's Application settings tab in Suite Administration.
  • If the Attachments field has been defined as encrypted for this record type and you are a member of an encryption domain, click Add encrypted attachments to attach an encrypted file to the record.
  • Attachments aren't visible in the Service Portal.
